description: This file defines custom error handling classes and middleware functions for an Express.js-based Node.js backend, including an ApiError class and error handlers.

classes.name: ApiError
classes.description: Custom error class extending Error, including an HTTP status code and optional details.

methods.name: notFoundHandler
methods.description: Middleware to handle 404 Not Found errors, forwarding to next error handler.

methods.name: errorHandler
methods.description: General error handling middleware for Express, sending JSON error response.
